payment_not_found.title: Payment Not Found
payment_not_found.description: Payment information for this order was not found. Please check the order code or contact support.

payment_failed.title: Payment Failed
payment_failed.description: The payment transaction was unsuccessful. Please try again or use a different payment method.
payment_failed.descriptionWithReason: The payment transaction was unsuccessful. Reason: {{reason}}. Please try again or use a different payment method.

system_error.title: System Error
system_error.description: A system error occurred during payment processing. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.

payment_cancelled.title: Payment Cancelled
payment_cancelled.description: The payment transaction has been cancelled. You can try again if you wish to continue with the payment.

unknown.title: Unknown Error
unknown.description: An unknown error occurred during payment processing. Please try again or contact support.

success.title: Payment Successful
success.description: Your payment transaction has been processed successfully. Thank you for using our service!
success.helpText: Detailed information has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox.

configShop.isRandomItemAgainDescription: Randomize the list of shop items when creating
configShop.autoPrecreateSettingsDescription: Configure automatic creation of shop banners
configShop.minMaxError: Maximum quantity must be greater than or equal to minimum quantity

configShop.maxMustBeAtLeast1: Maximum quantity must be at least 1

managerGrammar.title: Grammar Library
managerGrammar.description: Review and curate grammar patterns used across lessons.
managerGrammar.fallbackError: Unable to load grammar list. Please try again.

emptyState.title: No grammar found
emptyState.subtitle: Try adjusting the filters or add a new grammar item.

createGrammar.title: Create Grammar Pattern
createGrammar.description: Document a new grammar structure with multilingual explanations.
createGrammar.quickGuideDescription: 1) Fill the Japanese structure and example. 2) Pick the JLPT level. 3) For each language, provide an explanation and a usage example. You can collapse the language cards to stay focused.
createGrammar.structureHint: Use the exact grammar form that will appear in lessons.
createGrammar.levelHint: Choose the closest proficiency level where this grammar is taught.
createGrammar.examplePlaceholder: 例：宿題をしているところだ。
createGrammar.exampleHint: Provide a short Japanese sentence showing the grammar in context.
createGrammar.translationHint: Add explanations and sample sentences for each language.
createGrammar.languageHint: Pick which audience will see this explanation.
createGrammar.translationExplanationPlaceholder: Explain how to use this grammar point...
createGrammar.translationExplanationHint: Describe the nuance or constraints in this language.
createGrammar.translationExamplePlaceholder: Provide a sample sentence in the selected language...
createGrammar.translationExampleHint: Keep the sentence short and highlight the grammar usage.
